column5: Well I decided it was high time to put a rod longer than 7'6" into my Daughter's arsenal. 	She does have many options to choose from but any time a rod longer than 7'6" is needed she's had to borrow one of mine.  	So as a surprise that she'll see this afternoon I built her an NFC HM St 964-2 (9'6" ~ 6-12 line rating), and paired it up with a Shimano Twin Power C3000XG.  	I'm thinking she'll be quite surprised.Â  ğŸ™‚
Wow very nice ! Beautiful rod and that reel is top shelf ! Lucky girl to have a Dad like you...

Good for you Spiel. That is a very beautiful rod and reel combo it truly is and very practical, I love it. I would be very proud to be standing shoulder to shoulder amongst other anglers with it in my hands. It is so nice to see parents getting there youngsters into fishing. Thanks to old Pappy here my whole family including my Grand children and especially my wife are very much into it. I do not know about these days but back in the 80s fishing was the fastest growing outdoor sport in North America. Sadly in todays society it seems to have died off some what. I am sure your daughter will have many pleasurable hours reeling in lunkers with it.Â  Thanks for sharing.
Beautiful work Spiel, she will be happy for sure
That is a sweet blank buddy and a real nice gift. Hope she does not say,reely dad,a rod ? LOL GREAT GIFT
Beautiful outfit! I'm sure that she'll love it!!!!

And a reel, thanks Brian. Thank you Cliff, no grammatical errors on this one.Â Â  ğŸ˜„ Thank you Mamona, she'll be here an hour. She has seen it in progress but had no idea it was for her. Thank you Sir, most kind. Thank you Barry. She's not a young'n these days as she'll be 30 this year. She is however the only one of my 3 who still loves to go fishing, so ya.....I spoil her.
Thanks David, I can't wait to get her out on the big lake with it for some spring salmon and trout action.
Very cool. Will you adopt me please...:)

Adopt, hmmm, I don't know but I do know you're welcome in my home anytime Sir. You too Simon I welcome in my home anytime. Thank you Stik. Thank you Phil, most kind.
If you like Spiel I can set up you up with some good Drum way points she may want to brake the rod inğŸ‘ğŸ˜‚
There's never been any doubt in my mind Pal. When it comes to Sheephead you Sir are without peers.Â   ğŸ˜„

Thanks Phil, hoping she'll be getting some Spring Trout and Salmon on is very soon.
